title: Lease Up? This Brand-New 3-Bedroom has the SPACE you need!
posting_body: ['Lease Up?', 'This Brand-New 3-Bedroom has the SPACE you need!', 'show contact info', 'ext.', '300', "It's time to make some changes, stop paying too much for your old, cramped apartment!", "This Brand NEW home is full of upgrades you'll love at a price you can afford so why rent when you can own?", 'You can own this spacious home for less than you pay in rent!', 'Call us today to find out how.', 'Juniper Features', '3 Bedrooms', '2 Bathrooms', '2 Car garage w/ opener', 'All new kitchen appliances', 'All new flooring', 'Beautiful wood cabinets', 'And so much more!', '$1,689 per month*', 'Phone calls preferred.', 'If responding by email, please provide your contact information.', 'P & I. Price $369,900, 5.50% Fixed / 6.18% APR, 20% Down, CONV 30 Year OAC from third party lender.', 'Other fees such as taxes, insurance and HOA are not included in the sample monthly payment amount.', 'Prices and rates are subject to change without notice.']
